00097   enum {SELECT = ZOOM+1,MEASURE = ZOOM+2,SELECT_TIME = ZOOM+3,SELECT_EVENT = ZOOM+4,ADD_EVENT = ZOOM+5,DRAW_LINE = ZOOM+6};

00173   inline void groupColorUpdate(int groupId,bool active){
00174    //Everything has to be redraw
00175    drawContentsMode = REDRAW ;
00176     if(active) update();    
00177   };  
00178   
00180   inline void updateDrawing(){  
00181    if(retrieveClusterData) updateClusterData(true);
00182    else{
00183     //Everything has to be redraw
00184     drawContentsMode = REDRAW ;
00185     update();
00186    }   
00187   };
00188 
00193   void groupsModified(bool active);
00194 
00199   inline void setMode(BaseFrame::Mode selectedMode,bool active){  
00200    Mode previousMode = mode;
00201    mode = selectedMode;
00202    if(selectedMode == SELECT){
00203     setCursor(selectCursor);
00204     drawRubberBand(false); 
00205    }
00206    if(selectedMode == SELECT_EVENT){
00207     setCursor(selectEventCursor);
00208     drawRubberBand(false);
00209    }
00210    if(selectedMode == ADD_EVENT){
00211     setCursor(addEventCursor);
00212     drawRubberBand(false);
00213    }
00214    if(selectedMode == ZOOM){
00215     setCursor(zoomCursor); 
00216     drawRubberBand(false); 
00217    } 
00218    if(selectedMode == MEASURE){
00219     drawRubberBand(true);
00220     setCursor(measureCursor);
00221    }
00222    if(selectedMode == SELECT_TIME){
00223     drawRubberBand(true,true);
00224     setCursor(selectTimeCursor);
00225    }
00226    if(selectedMode == DRAW_LINE){
00227     setCursor(drawLineCursor);
00228     drawRubberBand(false); 
00229    }   
00230    if(previousMode == SELECT){
00231     selectedChannels.clear();
00232     drawContentsMode = REDRAW;
00233     if(active) update();     
00234    }
00235    if(previousMode == SELECT_EVENT){
00236     selectedEvent.first = "";
00237     selectedEvent.second = 0;
00238     drawContentsMode = REDRAW;
00239     if(active) update();
00240    }
00241    if(previousMode == ADD_EVENT){
00242     newEventPosition = -1;
00243    }
00244    if(previousMode == DRAW_LINE){
00245     linePositions.clear();
00246    }
00247   };
00248

00370   inline void updateEvents(QString providerName,bool active){
00371    if(!eventProvidersToUpdate.contains(providerName)) eventProvidersToUpdate.append(providerName);
00372    if(active) update();

00415   inline void samplingRateModified(long long length){
00416    recordingLength = length;
00417    int samplingRate = tracesProvider.getSamplingRate();
00418    timeStepUnit = timeStep = static_cast<float>(static_cast<float>(1000) / static_cast<float>(samplingRate));
00419   };

00500   inline void eventToAddProperties(QString providerName,QString eventDescription){
00501    //If an event is being modified, this function can be called with eventDescription set to empty,
00502    //this should not be taken into account.
00503    if(!eventBeingModified){
00504     eventDescriptionToCreate = eventDescription;
00505     eventProvider = providerName;     
00506    }
00507   };

00862   struct ClusterData{
00863     Array<dataType> data;
00864     bool ready;
00865 
00866     ClusterData(Array<dataType> d,bool status){
00867       data = d;
00868       ready = status;
00869     };
00870     ClusterData(){
00871      ready = false; 
00872     };
00873     void setStatus(bool status){ready = status;};
00874     void setData(Array<dataType>& d){data = d;};
00875     bool status(){return ready;};
00876     Array<dataType>& getData(){return data;};
00877     
00878     ~ClusterData(){};
00879   };

00924   struct EventData{
00925     Array<dataType> times;
00926     Array<int> ids;
00927     bool ready;
00928 
00929     EventData(Array<int> d,Array<dataType> t,bool status){
00930       times = t;
00931       ids = d;
00932       ready = status;
00933     };
00934     EventData(){
00935      ready = false;
00936     };
00937     void setStatus(bool status){ready = status;};
00938     void setData(Array<dataType>& t,Array<int>& d){
00939       times = t;
00940       ids = d;
00941     };
00942     bool status(){return ready;};
00943     Array<int>& getIds(){return ids;};
00944     Array<dataType>& getTimes(){return times;};
00945     
00946     ~EventData(){};
00947   };
